attributes.action: Retract the business rate rise for pubs
attributes.additional_details:
Not only are pubs taxed on absolutely everything but we’re having to deal with soaring energy bills on top. 
The rise in business rates is a kick in the teeth. 
Pubs are a big part of history and should be protected. A place to make friends/ relationships/ and keep lonely people occupied. 
The pub closures will cause a ripple of staff then companies that will be forced out of work. 
Have some humanity- retract the rates rise.
attributes.background:
Pubs are struggling more than ever since Covid, the damage Covid caused to hospitality is huge and no where near repaired yet ! 
Many once thriving pubs are now closing almost daily. Those still open struggling to keep prices affordable,

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions, which call for similar action:

"Cut VAT, Slash Beer Duty, reform business rates and cap energy costs for pubs"
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734677

"Do not implement the business rate increases planned for April 2026"
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/753272

"Reduce all taxes (inc. business rates, NI) for all pubs and restaurants by 5%"
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/731533
